pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flood Frequency Analysis Framework // Tools to support systematic and reproducible workflows for both stationary and nonstationary flood frequency analysis, with applications extending to other hydroclimate extremes, such as precipitation frequency analysis. This package implements the FFA framework proposed by Vidrio- Sahagn et al. (2024) doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2024.105940, originally developed in 'MATLAB', now adapted for the 'R' environment. This work was funded by the Flood Hazard Identification and Mapping Program of Environment and Climate Change Canada, as well as the Canada Research Chair (Tier 1) awarded to Dr. Pietroniro.
